item.title: Melting a list of columns
item.description: An answer to this tweet “Are there any #Rstats tidy expeRts who’d be interested in improving the efficiency of this code that gathers multiple variables from wide to long? This works but it’s not pretty. There must be a prettier way…" Wide data frame has three time points where participants answer two questions on two topics. create data from original code #Simmed data Time1.Topic1.Question1 <- rnorm(500) data <- data.frame(Time1.Topic1.Question1) data$Time1.
